landmarks.calvarium_rim: Hyperechoic curved/ovoid calvarial outline forming the cranial boundary.
landmarks.midline_echo: Central echogenic line/plane representing midline falx/echo.
landmarks.thalami: Paired, relatively symmetric central structures (often mildly echogenic) near midline.
landmarks.csp: Anechoic or hypoechoic structure (box-like, slit-like, or triangular gap) located in the anterior midline, anterior to the thalami.
landmarks.lateral_ventricle_margins: Echogenic ventricular walls/margins (do not assume atrium unless seen).
landmarks.third_ventricle: Thin anechoic slit-like space between thalami (only if distinct).
landmarks.posterior_fossa: Posterior fossa structures; often obscured by acoustic shadow. Mark 'not_clearly_seen' if only a dark shadow is visible.

landmarks.calvarium_rim: Hyperechoic curved/ovoid calvarial outline forming the cranial boundary.
landmarks.midline_echo: Central echogenic line/plane representing midline falx/echo.
landmarks.lateral_ventricle: Anechoic/low-echo ventricular cavity with definable echogenic walls.
landmarks.atrium_region: Posterior/atrium portion of lateral ventricle (only if identifiable as atrium region).
landmarks.choroid_plexus: Echogenic tissue within ventricle (commonly in atrium) â€” only if clearly echogenic within cavity.
landmarks.csp: CSP is often not clearly seen here; mark not_clearly_seen unless a definite box-like anechoic cavity is present.
landmarks.posterior_fossa: Posterior fossa structures; often obscured by acoustic shadow. Mark 'not_clearly_seen' if only a dark shadow is visible.

landmarks.calvarium_rim: Hyperechoic curved/ovoid calvarial outline forming the cranial boundary.
landmarks.midline_echo: Central echogenic midline structure (if present in field).
landmarks.cerebellum: Paired cerebellar hemispheres / posterior fossa content with characteristic symmetric outline (only if clearly defined).
landmarks.posterior_fossa: Posterior fossa region containing cerebellum/adjacent structures.
landmarks.cisterna_magna: Anechoic space posterior to cerebellum (only if clearly delineated).
landmarks.csp: Often out_of_view; do not claim present unless clearly seen.
landmarks.thalami: Often out_of_view; do not claim present unless clearly seen.
